######################################################################

title:: Glossary Element

id:: td-000013

######################################################################

This SML document contains a 'glossary' data element.  The 'glossary'
statement tells an application that the block of text is the text of a
glossary definition.

The term defined in the glossary element below is [g:sml:special
feature].

glossary:: special feature {sml} = (SML) A feature that enables
document authors to minimize the maintenance burden of updating
documents and to automate certain document content generation
